text: Va ʙar sari har rohe nanisined, ki [ʙo zurgiri va duzdi mardumro] ʙitarsoned va harkiro imon dorad, az rohi Alloh taolo ʙozdored va rohasro munharif ʙixohed [ki ʙa hidojat dast najoʙad]. Va ʙa jod ovared, hangomero ki andak ʙuded, sipas Alloh taolo [te'dodi] sumoro fuzuni ʙaxsid va ʙingared, ki sarancomi mufsidon [-i taʙahkor] ci guna ʙud
